title: LG LJ523D 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (32LJ523D)

product_specification.Aspect Ratio: 5 Modes: 16:9, Original, 4:3, Vertical Zoom, All Direction Zoom
product_specification.Other Video Features:
Dynamic Color Enhancer
PMI 300: Clarity, Color, Contrast
Active Noise Reduction
Picture Mode: 8 Modes (Vivid, Standard, APS, Cinema, Cricket, Game, Expert1, Expert2)
Picture: JPEG
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Cinema, Clear Voice, Cricket, Bollywood, Game
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: Audio Codec: AC3(Dolby Digital), EAC3, HE-AAC, AAC, MP2, MP3, PCM, DTS, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features:
Sound Optimizer: 3 Modes (Stand Type I, Stand Type II, Wall-mounted Type)
Clear Voice II
Powerful Sound
product_specification.Component In (RGB Cable): Component In (Y, Pb, Pr Plus Audio): 1 (Composite/Component Common)
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features:
Audio Out
Headphone Out: 1
Divx (SD/HD): DivX HD
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Conventional Panel, IPS Side View, Subtitle for DivX (Language): 20 Language (Arabic, Cantonese, English, French, German, Hebrew, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, Maori, Persian, Russian, Spanish, Vietnamese, Chinese, Malay, Thai, Tamil), IPS Front View, OSD Language: Total 15, Indian: 3 (Hindi, Bengali, Telugu)
product_specification.Stand Features: Flexi Mount: Adjust TV Viewing Angle
product_specification.Other Dimensions: Min Depth (Without Stand): 66mm, Set Weight (In Carton): 6.2 Kg
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year LG India Comprehensive Warranty and additional 1 year Warranty is applicable on panel/module
product_specification.Covered in Warranty:
Defect arising out of Faulty or defective material or workmanship
The Warranty Extension will be done basis the date of purchase & Offer Validity
Extended 1 Year Warranty offer is valid till 30th June 2018
Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
Applicable on purchase of all size 80cm (32) and above TV models only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: On-site Service, Customer needs to call the Customer Care Number, service engineer will come to the site to get the product repair
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Great Picture Quality: You are sure to fall in love with this TV's superior IPS panel, which ensures great colour reproduction and viewing angles. Also, you get a Color Master Engine that not only enhances the colour of the content, but also adjusts the colour saturation, hue and luminance. So you see content the way it was meant to be seen.
product_description.Game On: Whether you have a kid in the house or you yourself are a kid at heart, this feature is sure to win you over. This TV comes with a bunch of games already built into the system. So you don't have to go through the hassle of buying a console and plugging it in.

review: Wonderful TV, same day installation, clear and powerful sound. I am using hd set top box..... And can not differentiate that it is HD ready TV.... It's performance is like FHD TV.

First of all i would like to appreciate Flipkart for their delivery service with their partner Gati Courier Services.
Only Flipkart is able to deliver large appliances products to several areas here in Uttar Pradesh. Full marks on this.
Product delivered early than promised date and with absolute care.
Coming to TV it's excellent , LG has made name for their panels. You can get same type of TV from VU and Micromax at lower price but than again when it comes to reliability and brand value i would stuck with LG, Samsung and won't mind paying extra premium.
It's the new 2017 model having 2 HDMI ,1 USB ports and all are easily accessible. Satisfied with the panel as it served my purpose.
Installation was done by Jeeves provided free by Flipkart. Installation was done in quick time and engineers were very polite.
Good job Flipkart and OmniTechRetail 👍

Excellent led tv provided by flip cart with best price of 15499/- unbeatable.
Tv is very good in this price with great picture quality. I say only one word overall"amazing"

Purchased the product looking after review in Flip kart. Guys please do not show interest better to buy at LG or other Stores.
Customers will leave hope on Flip kart if delivers a product like this and has to concentrate more of product quality not on delivery time.

Compared the same LG product (different model with same features which i brought in store) lot's of difference in product quality

2 Star for Screen Display,Noticed the white Lines and black lines
1 Star for Product Quality.
0 Star for Sound System.U feel as if you hearing the running FM Radio in Traffic.
5 Star for Flip-kart Delivery in time and Installation by LG executive.

Please do not show intrest in buying this product.

Excellemt choice for somone looking to buys just a standard Led TV and not smart TV. Media player plays virtually any file format you throw at it via USB.

Sound quality is very good with deep bass and balanced highs. Picture quality is very sharp. Excellent job done by ekart logistics and jeeves to get TV delivered and installed withing 24hrs of ordering.

Overall 5 star.

I purchased a new LG TV. Product is very Nice. Delivery also Super fast, Flipkart working Very Nice and Installation work also Good

I m Satisfied..

Thank u Flipkart..
Thank you Jeeves consumer service private limited for Fast installing.

the 5* rating is for flipkart. tv delivered in two days as promised, installation done on same day, a day before the assured date. Well done flipkart!!!

Now regarding the tv, i just had a day of watching...so this review is based on that.

pros:
1. Picture quality is good only for HD channels, SD channels not so good. when i played HD videos thru USB (1TB hard disc) it played smoothly, no lag, awesome clarity. The colors are as good as what you see in naked eye. Even the videos of my 5mp cellphone camera look better than what it looks in my phone or PC.
2. Sound is good, not great but you wont complain. i played some mp3 songs and the sound is really superb.
3. The wall mount provided by flipkart (free) is adjustable, so no problem in accessing the ports which are all in the back of the tv.
4. This is a 2017 model, so better to buy this rather than old 2015 models of samsung (in the same price range around 20k) where the sound is also not good.
5. the Jeeves installation partner also provides 1 (tv) + 2 years of extended warranty at 1900 that is optional.

cons:
This tv has FM radio, but the signal is really really poor in a metro like chennai , so definitely it wont be good for non-metros. One of the reasons i preferred this tv was the FM radio but i m disappointed.

So far so good, will review it again maybe after a couple of months.

One of the best 32 inch LED TV.Good video and audio (IPS Panel & 20W Dolby sound and many more) for 19990 only,this is very good deal.I brought from the seller Omni tech Retail.Installation was done by Jeeves.Item is deliverd as per the schedule and delivery person opened the sealed box in front of me and checked for any damages and showed me all accessoires.but installation is delayed one day.
Installation guy is very professional.They(Jeeves) provide good quality free wall mount stand.Friends if you want to buy 32 inch LED TV buy this without any hesitation and try to buy from the seller Omni tech Retail.

Pretty good product by LG at this price, packing was alright, reached me in two days. Display looks crisp and bright, sound is good enough.
I think seller is genuine, so the real concern here is Flipkart, I was promised a demo and installation the next day which is today and It's been delayed after I made the payment. It's per Flipkarts convenience and not mine. It's not professionalism. 3 stars.

Awesome TV
Bought @15.3k
Picture quality awesome 5/5
Sound quality good 4/5
LG inbuilt games 2/5
Remote Quality as regular 3.5/5
Power saving 5/5
LG Logo 3/5 it can be of splendor quality
Flipkart 5/5

Best TV under the budget segment. Pictures look stunning and sound is matching to expectations. It can play mkv, mp4. Videos through USB. Playing Full HD videos shows its capabilities.
FM radio will play fine if you put antenna at right places.
Note:
1. For best sound quality , you should have good sound system.
2. Airtel TV, TATA sky or Dish TV are recommended companion . Local cable connection doesn't match your expectations
Picture clarity is awasome.. Got it for 14.4 K..Sound quality also superb but bass is bit low... It plays almost every format through Harddisk..Over all fantastic deal.. Go for it.. Lve u LG

Decent TV. Above average perfirmance, Worth the pricing @ 175499. If you are looking for plain valina TV, without any so called 'smart' features, Go for it.
Excellent support from seller QRS and flipcart.

Flipkart commited for two days but delivered and installation completed in one day. LG with this much starting price Rs.18999 is a great deal. Product clarity sound excellent at this budget. It comes with wall mount free. Installation free .Recommended with 5 star.

LG is very good product using from more than one month it's a very good product picture clarity is also very nice with IPS panel and loud sound quality with surround system. the speaker is given in this tv is very good performing. highly recommended to go this product...

Once again Thanks flipcart.

Thanks and Regards,

Great choice which offers great performance at this price range. I bought it at 18799. No extra charges. Service engineer from LG has done the free installation next day. He provided wall mount (no additional cost).
I prefer buying known and reputed brand to avoid hassles in future, So LG is my first preference in TV. Here's I rated this TV:
Sound: 10/10
Picture: 9/10
Connectivity: 8/10
Easy of use: 8/10
Build quality: 9/10
Look and feel: 10/10
Though it is not a smart TV, we can connect Chromecast or Fire stick and make it completely smart :)
I am Happy Customer!!

Excellent product.! Worth buying. Prompt delivery from Flipkart (packing could have been even better). Do not hesitate to buy this product and amazing prizing from Flipkart, thanks for that... Ultimately, a must buy product in HD ready TV segment.

This product is not full HD TV but they looks likes HD TV. Sound quality is very good, picture quality is good, screen size is 32" and other body and parts is very good . There are no other connectivity sources like wifi, bluetooth, internet, and other feature. It has only usb port, hdmi port, FM . This is a simple HD TV. You can buy this item

The delivery speed of the TV from Flipkart was amazing. Order was placed the previous night and delivery happened the next day morning.

But what’s the use of this super fast delivery if the installation date is 2 days or so later and no visibility of the progress?

Installation of a TV is no big deal especially if there is no wall mounting involved. However I was told that the warranty is void if I do it myself.

It’s 2 days since delivery. But till today, I have not received any information when the installation will happen. My time for the last 2 days and until installation is hijacked as I have to wait at home for the installation. This is not good.

value for money i have purchased TV 2 months before and still date no any issue.
after TV purchased within 2 days I got delivery and very good support from flipkart for installation.
believe flipkart is very good as compared Amazon.

Pros:
- Bought "LG 80cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV" during Diwali offer (2017) for Rs.15,248. Worth for money.
- Delivery was done as per committed date.
- There was no issues (physical damage) found.
- Installation was done on the next day of delivery, by the technician assigned by the Flip-kart.

Cons:
The technician brought the Wall mount by himself, since it will not be available in the TV package.
Technician was asking Rs.800 for the Wall mount. As per Flip-kart, Wall mount should be given free to the customer.
After my argument he gave up.

So, given 4 stars for the good thing and reducing 1 star for that bad experience.
Worth buying.best best tv under 16k with free wall mount and installation.compared to others this one is the best in this price segment
